Text:
If curious what's next....How bout something back from when alot of us were kids. The org. Transformers: The Movie (1986), this is the 20th anv. edition. Ugh, yes even in the 80's their was a few cuss words (just an an fyi though). Peter Cullen is a F'in savior! Not only did he do Transformer movies then, he did ones now (included the video game) and now doing brand new TV series coming out this year called; Transformers: Prime". Sorry, got carried away cause he's like a god.............
Observe & leave nothing un-downloaded! -DropKilla
Not a DVD. Moved to Movies.
@Alia: What do you consider a "DVD" here?
A DVD is a full DVD rip. When it's the main movie only, it's simply goes to Movies.
